TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ToolStripRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 处理 对象的绘制功能。

span.span: Handles the painting functionality for objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类将特定样式或主题应用于应用。Use the class to apply a particular style or theme to a . 而不是自定义绘制并及其包含的对象，设置属性设置为从继承的对象。Rather than custom painting a and the objects it contains, you set the property to an object that inherits from . 指定的绘制方式应用于，以及它包含的项。The painting specified by the is applied to the , as well as the items it contains. 可以执行自定义绘制几种方法中的控件。You can do custom painting in controls in several ways. 与其他 Windows 窗体控件一样，并两者都具有可重写`OnPaint`方法和`Paint`事件。As with other Windows Forms controls, the and both have overridable `OnPaint` methods and `Paint` events. 因为与常规的绘制坐标系统是相对于控件; 客户端区域也就是说，该控件的左上角为 0，0。As with regular painting, the coordinate system is relative to the client area of the control; that is, the upper left-hand corner of the control is 0, 0. `Paint`事件和`OnPaint`方法的行为类似于其他控件绘制事件。The `Paint` event and `OnPaint` method for a behave like other control paint events. 类具有可重写方法，用于绘制背景、 项背景色、 项图像、 项箭头、 项文本和边框的。The class has overridable methods for painting the background, item background, item image, item arrow, item text, and border of the . 这些方法的事件自变量公开多个属性，如矩形、 颜色和文本格式，可以根据需要调整。The event arguments for these methods expose several properties such as rectangles, colors, and text formats that you can adjust as desired. 若要调整的几个方面如何绘制项，通常可以重写。To adjust just a few aspects of how an item is painted, you typically override the . 如果你正在编写新项，并想要控制绘制的所有方面，重写`OnPaint`方法。If you are writing a new item and want to control all aspects of the painting, override the `OnPaint` method. 从内部`OnPaint`，可以使用从方法。From within `OnPaint`, you can use methods from the . 默认情况下进行双缓冲，充分利用设置。By default, the is double buffered, taking advantage of the setting. ## Examples 以下代码示例演示了如何实现一个自定义 类。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a custom class. `GridStripRenderer`类自定义的三个方面`GridStrip`控件的外观：`GridStrip`边框边框和映像。The `GridStripRenderer` class customizes three aspects of the `GridStrip` control's appearance: `GridStrip` border, border, and image. 完整代码列表，请参阅[如何：实现自定义 ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md)。For a full code listing, see [How to: Implement a Custom ToolStripRenderer](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-a-custom-toolstriprenderer.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familystatic hidebysig void ScaleArrowOffsetsIfNeeded() cil managed

summary.span: 如果需要基于计算机的 DPI 设置来进行缩放，则将 和 值应用于缩放箭头图标。

span.span: Applies the and values to scaling the arrow icon, if scaling is required based on the DPI settings of the computer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familystatic hidebysig void ScaleArrowOffsetsIfNeeded(int32 dpi) cil managed
Protected Shared Sub ScaleArrowOffsetsIfNeeded (dpi As Integer)

param.name: dpi
param.span: 用于缩放的 DPI 值。

span.span: The DPI value to use for scaling.

summary.span: 基于指定的 DPI 值将 和 值应用于缩放箭头图标。

span.span: Applies the and values to scaling the arrow icon based on the specified DPI value.

remarks.format: 此重载`ScaleArrowOffsetsIfNeeded`仅当选择应用程序时，应在派生类中调用方法[每个监视器版本 2](~/docs/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility.md#accessibility-switches)，面向.NET Framework 4.7.1 或更高版本，并且具有`EnableDpiChangedMessageHandling`和`EnableDpiChangedHighDpiImprovements`打开配置切换。This overload of the `ScaleArrowOffsetsIfNeeded` method should be called in a derived class only when an application opts into [per-monitor version 2](~/docs/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility.md#accessibility-switches), targets .NET Framework 4.7.1 or later, and has the `EnableDpiChangedMessageHandling` and `EnableDpiChangedHighDpiImprovements` configuration switches turned on. 它会通知有关新 DPI，并在右侧的维度，以计算允许呈现箭头的偏移量。It informs the about the new DPI and allows the offsets for rendering arrows in the right dimensions to be calculated.
